channel.title: Comments on: Why the Prediction That Christ Would Come May 21 Was Wrong (Part 2 of 8)

item.title: By: johnny farese
item.dc:creator: johnny farese
item.description:
Harold Camping is now claiming that October 21st, 2011 is the actual judgment day. Very sad.
One day, appointed by God from all eternity, judgment will come upon everybody. Herald Camping has made the truth of God's Word appear to be false and unreliable by his false prophetic claims. This is sobering and no laughing matter. This man is delusional, or a con-artist. We should pray that God would grant him repentance. Otherwise, his judgment will be most severe.
item.content:encoded:
Harold Camping is now claiming that October 21st, 2011 is the actual judgment day. Very sad.

One day, appointed by God from all eternity, judgment will come upon everybody. Herald Camping has made the truth of God’s Word appear to be false and unreliable by his false prophetic claims. This is sobering and no laughing matter. This man is delusional, or a con-artist. We should pray that God would grant him repentance. Otherwise, his judgment will be most severe.
